note:
I really like Mastodon's credo in comparison with other social media. Open source and decentralized are the best.

I don't subscribe to any religion, but the closest I come to is agnostic Buddhist. Since it's crystal clear shitty people don't get theirs in this life, I'd like to think they'll get theirs in their next one, even if I don't fully believe it. A coping mechanism.

Autistic animal lover. Vegetarian. Video game enthusiast. Linux user. Pansexual. He/him.
